lessons.title: 1. Practice: Welding Robot Programming
lessons.notes:
Robot Welding Practice

Hands-on programming of industrial welding robots. Learn teach pendant operation, path planning, and weld parameter settings used in real car factories.

  • 6-axis robot kinematics
  • Weld seam tracking
  • Safety interlocks & fencing

lessons.title: 2. Practice: Paint Booth Operations
lessons.notes:
Paint Shop Practice

Automotive paint booth operations including spray gun handling, booth ventilation, and quality inspection. Practice on training panels before real cars.

  • HVLP spray techniques
  • Orange peel prevention
  • Paint defect identification

lessons.title: 3. Practice: Assembly Line Timing
lessons.notes:
Assembly Line Practice

Toyota-style assembly line simulation. Practice 90-second takt time per station with real tools and sequential part installation.

  • Kanban card system
  • Andon cord procedures
  • Line stop authority

lessons.title: 4. Quality Control Inspection
lessons.notes:
QC Inspection Practice

Learn 100+ point vehicle inspection checklist. Practice gap measurements, panel alignment, and functional testing used by every manufacturer.

  • 0.5mm gap tolerance
  • LED paint defect detection
  • NVH testing procedures
